title: Scruffles Finds a Home
description: Just in time for Christmas, Scruffles Finds a Home, the latest children’s book by Barbara Ann Derksen, is the story of a field mouse who seeks shelter from the upcoming winter storms in a building that’s called Santa’s Castle. Scruffles finds herself in a race for her life from a large man in a red suit while she attempts to make friends with castle inhabitants. This delightful story will warm the hearts of children of all ages, especially if they’ve traveled to Storm Lake and visited Santa’s Castle. However the story is fun and interesting to all who like a good warm Christmas novel.
author: Barbara Ann Derksen
